SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DELETE NETWORK ACTION FAILED ********"
! Network Name or UUID : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Network Name or UUID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Delete if active : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Delete if active" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_REMOVE_IF_ACTIVE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Prepare delete network command : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = "virsh net-undefine" ! Prepare delete transient network command : SET &UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD# = "virsh net-destroy"
!VM name or UUID : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Prepare command to get network info : SET &UC4RB_NETWORK_INFO_CMD# = "virsh net-info &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" : PRINT "Network Info Command Executed :: &UC4RB_NETWORK_INFO_CMD#" : PRINT "Stop Network Command Executed :: &UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD#" : PRINT "Remove Inactive Command Executed :: &UC4RB_CMD#"
node_info=`&UC4RB_NETWORK_INFO_CMD#` echo "Provided Network &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# info:" echo "${node_info}" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.CHECK_COMMAND_STAUS transient=`echo "$node_info" | grep Persistent:` : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.CHECK_COMMAND_STAUS
: IF &UC4RB_KVM_REMOVE_IF_ACTIVE# EQ "YES" if [[ $transient =~ .*no.* ]] then ! Delete Transient Network &UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD# else active=`echo "$node_info" | grep Active:` : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.CHECK_COMMAND_STAUS if [[ $active =~ .*yes.* ]] then &UC4RB_INCATIVE_STATE_CMD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.CHECK_COMMAND_STAUS fi &UC4RB_CMD# fi : ELSE active=`echo "$node_info" | grep Active:` : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.CHECK_COMMAND_STAUS if [[ $active =~ .*no.* ]] then &UC4RB_CMD# else : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Provided network &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# is in active state." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO fi : ENDIF
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DELETE NETWORK ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
